headline: Pompeo Ignites Outrage With Statement Reviling ‘Unhinged’ News Media
abstract: In an extraordinary statement, Secretary of State Mike Pompeo criticized a veteran NPR reporter, Mary Louise Kelly, and said the news media was “unhinged.”
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Secretary of State Mike Pompeo escalated his clash with a respected NPR journalist on Saturday, lashing out at her and what he called the “unhinged” news media in an extraordinary statement. A day earlier, he abruptly ended an interview with her and delivered what the news outlet described as a profanity-laced rant.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
